attributes.name: instanceId
attributes.description: Internal identifier of the ioLimitRule instance.

attributes.name: id
attributes.description: Unique identifier of the ioLimitRule instance.

attributes.name: burstRate
attributes.description: The percentage of read/write IOPS and/or KBPS over the limits a storage object is allowed to process during a spike in demand.

attributes.name: burstTime
attributes.description: How long a storage object is allowed to process burst traffic.

attributes.name: burstFrequency
attributes.description: How often a storage object is allowed to process burst traffic for the duration of burst time

attributes.name: ioLimitpolicy
attributes.description: Information about the I/O limit policy to which the I/O limit rule is assigned, as defined by the ioLimitPolicy resource type.

content.name: ioLimitRule
content.description: (DEPRECATED)Conditions under which the storage system applies I/O limits. On GUI and CLI, ioLimitPolicy and ioLimitRule are combined for now since we only support one I/O limit rule per I/O limit policy.
